item.title: DOC
item.description: score:84 Chances: Healthpeak Properties, Inc. is a leading owner, operator, and developer of real estate for healthcare discovery and delivery, positioning it well to capitalize on the secular trends of the industry. The company operates through multiple segments, including Lab, Outpatient Medical, Continuing Care Retirement Community (CCRC), and Other Non-Reportable, diversifying its revenue streams and mitigating sector-specific risks.
